meanings.sent1: She iterates the dance moves to get them just right.
meanings.sent2: The machine iterates the task until it is completed.
meanings.sent3: He iterates his jokes so often that they are no longer funny.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the waves iterates the calming rhythm of nature.
meanings.sent5: The artist iterates the brush strokes until the painting is perfect.

meanings.sent1: The singer iterates the chorus to make it catchy.
meanings.sent2: The teacher iterates the lesson for better understanding.
meanings.sent3: The bird iterates its chirping every morning without fail.
meanings.sent4: The clock iterates its ticking throughout the day.
meanings.sent5: The child iterates the alphabet to learn it by heart.

meanings.definition: To engage in a process of iteration
meanings.sent1: The team iterates the design to improve its efficiency.
meanings.sent2: The software developer iterates the code to fix bugs.
meanings.sent3: The chef iterates the recipe until it tastes just right.
meanings.sent4: The author iterates the manuscript to perfect the storyline.
meanings.sent5: The scientist iterates the experiment to ensure accurate results.
